channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jury sees more sex videos as prosecutors wind down case against Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs
item.description: A jury has watched nearly 20 minutes of recordings of marathon sex events that prosecutors and defense lawyers have both cited as important to the outcome of the sex trafficking trial of music mogul Sean “Diddy” Combs.

item.title: The number of abortions kept rising in 2024 because of telehealth prescriptions, report finds
Man who opened fire outside a Michigan church had attended services there with his mom, pastor says
